title: My Pixel 4 XL's battery is swollen
content:
My Pixel 4 XL's battery is swollen (and the case has pushed open). I have stopped using it because of the danger that a swollen battery presents. 

I've had the phone for less than 11 months. What can I do? Can I get a replacement?

I purchased the phone from the Google Store in the USA, but am now in Japan. 

Thank you.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
